Mexico.blurb: Been to mexico a few times, most recently for a cruise.

Germany.blurb: Munich â€” Oktoberfest! 100% my favorite trip ever.

Dominican Republic.blurb: Have a timeshare with Lifestyles Resort. Last time there was senior trip with my friends, and it was a movie (literally, thanks Ryan Costanza).

Puerto Rico.blurb: Explored Old San Juan and tropical rainforests for my senior year Spanish trip. Such a cool trip and a great way to end the year.

Aruba.blurb: Went twice - Spring break junior year of college and back with my friends after graduation.

Austria.blurb: Went during Oktoberfest trip.. beautful city, just gorgeous. Mozartt's house was cool.

New Jersey.blurb: Office and friends live here - probably will be back to Atlantic City soon too.

Florida.blurb: Visited twice my senior year of High School - Delray Beach for varisty baseball and Disney for band trip.

California.blurb: Family trip to Hollywood, Aneheim, and LA. Visited Disneyland too.

Nevada.blurb: Vegas! Been 2 times, want to go back now that I'm older.

Pennsylvania.blurb: Been to a ton of trips here - Hershey, snowboarding, etc. Last time here was to pick up my dog Bailey!

Massachusetts.blurb: St. Patrick's Day Parade! Will be going back again, sucks the Red Sox are there.

Virginia.blurb: States Soccer tournament with Smithtown West, did not explore much.

Tennessee.blurb: Nashville for memorial day weekend. Such a cool city, would love to go back.

South Carolina.blurb: Visited Joe Scali down in SC.. golf courses were awesome.

Maryland.blurb: 8th grade trip to Washington.. everyone's been there.

Illinois.blurb: Visited Chicago as a family trip. LOVED the city.. made me fall in love with living there in the future.

Rhode Island.blurb: Visited Rhode Island for a family vacation. Goose Island, don't remember much.
